Author: ComputerGenie#2331
Content: 120 confirms is the result of shitcoins getting listed and their own networks aren't able to resist double spends against a 0.001BTC rental, so most all equihash coins now have insane conf times on most centralized exchanges

Author: ComputerGenie#2331
Content: the better solution would have been to require coins to be listed only if they can't be broken for $5 worth of rentals üò£
